Speaking to presenter Jackie O who has just had a baby girl, Angelina Jolie said, Enjoy every minute of it... it is the best time in your life, and strap them to you and sleep in the same bed with them... and just love every second. Congratulations Jackie O . At practice Wednesday, Michael Vick loosened up throwing passes to Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan, who is making his first Pro Bowl appearance in his third season and succeeded Michael Vick in Atlanta. Matt is great. The coaching staff is great. We're just having a good time, he said.`` I like what they're doing in the offense and it's been easy.
